title: NMN Pro 300™ - Uthever® NMN - 300 mg, 30 capsules
body_html:
Helps combat aging, improves heart health and promotes muscle strength

  • NMN supplementation has been found to improve various parameters of health, including physical endurance and muscle strength, neurological function, heart health, body weight and gene expression.
  • Nicotinamide mononucleotide (NMN) is a derivative of the B-vitamin niacin that dramatically improves health and longevity by serving as a precursor to NAD+.

View Certificate of Analysis »

Supports Longevity. Studies have shown that boosting NAD+ synthesis in the body extends the lifespan of yeast, worms and flies. (1)

Blood Sugar Regulation. As we age, we have more trouble processing glucose, leading to higher blood sugar. Supplemental NMN is shown to improve several markers of skeletal muscle glucose metabolism that are commonly dysregulated in people with metabolic disorders. (2)

Supports Metabolism and Healthy Weight. Although excessive body weight can develop at any age, adults over age 40 are particularly susceptible to age-related weight gain as metabolism slows down and body composition is altered to favor fat over lean muscle. As obese individuals have reductions in both NAD+ levels and ATP (energy) production, replenishing NAD+ through NMN can help to reverse this while improving metabolic pathways to maintain a healthy weight. (3,4,5)

Supports Healthy Cognition: Declining cognitive function with age is related to a reduced NAD+ levels that impair mitochondrial function. Replenishing NAD+ stores through NMN may be able to prevent this dysfunction. (6,7)

Supports Healthy Skin: In our 30s and 40s, the appearance of our skin can start to show signs of age. Several studies have examined how boosting NAD+ levels in the skin prevents premature skin aging or supports a healthier external appearance. (8,9)

References:

1. Fang EF, Kassahun H, Croteau DL, et al. NAD+ Replenishment Improves Lifespan and Healthspan in Ataxia Telangiectasia Models via Mitophagy and DNA Repair. Cell Metab. 2016;24(4):566-581. doi:10.1016/j.cmet.2016.09.004

2. Feng Z, Qin Y, Huo F, et al. NMN recruits GSH to enhance GPX4-mediated ferroptosis defense in UV irradiation induced skin injury. Biochim Biophys Acta Mol Basis Dis. 2022;1868(1):166287. doi:10.1016/j.bbadis.2021.166287

3. Gopi S, Balakrishnan P. Evaluation and clinical comparison studies on liposomal and non-liposomal ascorbic acid (vitamin C) and their enhanced bioavailability. J Liposome Res. 2021;31(4):356-364. doi:10.1080/08982104.2020.1820521

4. Katayoshi T, Nakajo T, Tsuji-Naito K. Restoring NAD+ by NAMPT is essential for the SIRT1/p53-mediated survival of UVA- and UVB-irradiated epidermal keratinocytes. J Photochem Photobiol B. 2021;221:112238. doi:10.1016/j.jphotobiol.2021.112238

5. Kim M, Seol J, Sato T, Fukamizu Y, Sakurai T, Okura T. Effect of 12-Week Intake of Nicotinamide Mononucleotide on Sleep Quality, Fatigue, and Physical Performance in Older Japanese Adults: A Randomized, Double-Blind Placebo-Controlled Study. Nutrients. 2022;14(4):755. Published 2022 Feb 11. doi:10.3390/nu14040755

6. Kiss T, Nyúl-Tóth Á, Balasubramanian P, et al. Nicotinamide mononucleotide (NMN) supplementation promotes neurovascular rejuvenation in aged mice: transcriptional footprint of SIRT1 activation, mitochondrial protection, anti-inflammatory, and anti-apoptotic effects. Geroscience. 2020;42(2):527-546. doi:10.1007/s11357-020-00165-5

7. Liao B, Zhao Y, Wang D, Zhang X, Hao X, Hu M. Nicotinamide mononucleotide supplementation enhances aerobic capacity in amateur runners: a randomized, double-blind study. J Int Soc Sports Nutr. 2021;18(1):54. Published 2021 Jul 8. doi:10.1186/s12970-021-00442-

8. Mills KF, Yoshida S, Stein LR, et al. Long-Term Administration of Nicotinamide Mononucleotide Mitigates Age-Associated Physiological Decline in Mice. Cell Metab. 2016;24(6):795-806. doi:10.1016/j.cmet.2016.09.013

9. Tarantini S, Valcarcel-Ares MN, Toth P, et al. Nicotinamide mononucleotide (NMN) supplementation rescues cerebromicrovascular endothelial function and neurovascular coupling responses and improves cognitive function in aged mice. Redox Biol. 2019;24:101192. doi:10.1016/j.redox.2019.101192

10. Wang X, Hu X, Yang Y, Takata T, Sakurai T. Nicotinamide mononucleotide protects against β-amyloid oligomer-induced cognitive impairment and neuronal death. Brain Res. 2016;1643:1-9. doi:10.1016/j.brainres.2016.04.060

11. Yoshino J, Mills KF, Yoon MJ, Imai S. Nicotinamide mononucleotide, a key NAD(+) intermediate, treats the pathophysiology of diet- and age-induced diabetes in mice. Cell Metab. 2011;14(4):528-536. doi:10.1016/j.cmet.2011.08.014

12. Yoshino M, Yoshino J, Kayser BD, et al. Nicotinamide mononucleotide increases muscle insulin sensitivity in prediabetic women. Science. 2021;372(6547):1224-1229. doi:10.1126/science.abe9985

Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 1 Capsule
Servings Per Container: 30
Amount Per Serving %DV
Uthever™ β-Nicotinamide Mononucleotide (NMN)
 300 mg †
† Daily Value not established.

Rev.11.23

  • OTHER INGREDIENTS: Vegetable capsule, rice flour.
  • DOES NOT CONTAIN: Dairy, egg, soy, wheat, gluten, corn, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts.
  • SUGGESTED DAILY USE: Take 1-3 capsules daily, with or without food, preferably in the morning, or as recommended by your healthcare professional.
  • NOTE: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight. Do not use if tamper-evident packaging is broken. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN
  • CAUTION: Not intended for use if you are pregnant or nursing. Not formulated for use in children. If you have a medical condition or are taking medications, consult with your healthcare professional before using this product.
  • Nicotinamide mononucleotide (NMN) is a derivative of the B-vitamin niacin that dramatically improves health and longevity by serving as a precursor to NAD+.
  • NMN supplementation has been found to improve various parameters of health, including physical endurance and muscle strength, neurological function, heart health, body weight, and gene expression.
  • NMN capsules provide maximum absorption by focusing delivery into the small intestine's Slc12a8 NMN transporter sites, where NMN absorption is increased over 100 times.
  • Only Clincially-Proven NMN. ProHealth’s NMN is the only clinically-proven NMN to boost NAD+ levels in a peer-reviewed, double-blind, placebo-controlled, published, clinical study. Results of the study indicated a 38% increase in NAD+ levels and 12-year reversal in biological age.
  • Unique Delivery Method. NMN Pro 300 focuses on delivery into the small intestine’s Slc12a8 transporter sites, where absorption is maximized and is increased over 100 times, greatly enhancing bioavailability.
  • Solvent-Free. Compared to other NMN products, ours is made without any chemical solvents.
  • Quality Manufacturing Practices. All of our products are manufactured in an FDA-registered, GMP-certified facility.
  • Third-Party Tested in the USA. Every batch is third-party tested in US laboratories to ensure the highest quality, purity and potency. Certificates of Analysis are available.
Be Aware of Fake NMN: Fraudulent companies are always attempting to out-price competitors by using NMN fake ingredients to gain market share, which is not fair to you, the consumer, or the reputable companies, like ProHealth that spends time and resources to ensure a safe and pure NMN product.

title: NMN Pro 300™ - Uthever® NMN - 300 mg, 30 capsules - 6 Pack
body_html:
Helps combat aging, improves heart health and promotes muscle strength

  • NMN supplementation has been found to improve various parameters of health, including physical endurance and muscle strength, neurological function, heart health, body weight and gene expression.
  • Nicotinamide mononucleotide (NMN) is a derivative of the B-vitamin niacin that dramatically improves health and longevity by serving as a precursor to NAD+.

View Certificate of Analysis »

Supports Longevity. Studies have shown that boosting NAD+ synthesis in the body extends the lifespan of yeast, worms and flies. (1)

Blood Sugar Regulation. As we age, we have more trouble processing glucose, leading to higher blood sugar. Supplemental NMN is shown to improve several markers of skeletal muscle glucose metabolism that are commonly dysregulated in people with metabolic disorders. (2)

Supports Metabolism and Healthy Weight. Although excessive body weight can develop at any age, adults over age 40 are particularly susceptible to age-related weight gain as metabolism slows down and body composition is altered to favor fat over lean muscle. As obese individuals have reductions in both NAD+ levels and ATP (energy) production, replenishing NAD+ through NMN can help to reverse this while improving metabolic pathways to maintain a healthy weight. (3,4,5)

Supports Healthy Cognition: Declining cognitive function with age is related to a reduced NAD+ levels that impair mitochondrial function. Replenishing NAD+ stores through NMN may be able to prevent this dysfunction. (6,7)

Supports Healthy Skin: In our 30s and 40s, the appearance of our skin can start to show signs of age. Several studies have examined how boosting NAD+ levels in the skin prevents premature skin aging or supports a healthier external appearance. (8,9)

References:

1. Fang EF, Kassahun H, Croteau DL, et al. NAD+ Replenishment Improves Lifespan and Healthspan in Ataxia Telangiectasia Models via Mitophagy and DNA Repair. Cell Metab. 2016;24(4):566-581. doi:10.1016/j.cmet.2016.09.004

Nicotinamide mononucleotide (NMN) is a derivative of the B-vitamin niacin that is known to promote health and longevity by serving as a precursor to NAD+, a compound that plays a crucial role in energy production, metabolism, and gene expression in the body. When we boost NMN levels in the body, we can enhance the biosynthesis of NAD+ and help restore more youthful levels of this crucial nutrient. In fact, NMN supplementation has been found to support various parameters of health, including physical endurance and muscle strength, brain health, heart health, body weight, and gene expression.

Purity in a Sea of Fake NMN

The popularity of NMN as an amazing anti-aging molecule has unfortunately given rise to many unscrupulous companies who are selling products they claim are NMN, but in fact contain little to no actual NMN. Even worse, they're often tainted with contaminants and heavy metals.

In this market flooded with fake and adulterated NMN, Uthever® NMN stands out as a product you can trust to be of exceptionally high quality, purity and potency.

From research through production, an all-star team oversees and guides each step of the Uthever® NMN development process.
  • The Uthever Research and Development Team is led by U.S. doctors from GlaxoSmithKline, a research-based pharmaceutical and healthcare company that has established itself as a world-class leader in both medicine and healthcare.
  • The Uthever Production Management Team is led by senior managers from Mars Wrigley, one of the world's largest food producers with numerous world-renowned brands.
  • The Uthever Scientific Quality Standard Setting Team is under the direction of a former USP scientist who ensures that Uthever® NMN is in strict accordance with USP quality standards. (USP is the U.S. Pharmacopoeia and the globally recognized quality standards agency that establishes standards for pharmaceutical development and manufacturing.)

title: NMN Pro 1000™ - Uthever® NMN, 1000 mg per serving, 60 capsules - 6 Pack
body_html:
Helps combat aging, improves heart health and promotes muscle strength

  • NMN supplementation has been found to improve various parameters of health, including physical endurance and muscle strength, neurological function, heart health, body weight and gene expression.
  • Nicotinamide mononucleotide (NMN) is a derivative of the B-vitamin niacin that dramatically improves health and longevity by serving as a precursor to NAD+.

View Certificate of Analysis »

Supports Longevity. Studies have shown that boosting NAD+ synthesis in the body extends the lifespan of yeast, worms and flies. (1)

Blood Sugar Regulation. As we age, we have more trouble processing glucose, leading to higher blood sugar. Supplemental NMN is shown to improve several markers of skeletal muscle glucose metabolism that are commonly dysregulated in people with metabolic disorders. (2)

Supports Metabolism and Healthy Weight. Although excessive body weight can develop at any age, adults over age 40 are particularly susceptible to age-related weight gain as metabolism slows down and body composition is altered to favor fat over lean muscle. As obese individuals have reductions in both NAD+ levels and ATP (energy) production, replenishing NAD+ through NMN can help to reverse this while improving metabolic pathways to maintain a healthy weight. (3,4,5)

Supports Healthy Cognition: Declining cognitive function with age is related to a reduced NAD+ levels that impair mitochondrial function. Replenishing NAD+ stores through NMN may be able to prevent this dysfunction. (6,7)

Supports Healthy Skin: In our 30s and 40s, the appearance of our skin can start to show signs of age. Several studies have examined how boosting NAD+ levels in the skin prevents premature skin aging or supports a healthier external appearance. (8,9)

title: NAD Triple Boost™  with NMN - 90 capsules
body_html:
The Most Complete NAD+ Formula Ever Developed

  • Recharges cellular energy at the source*2,3,5,16,17   
  • Supports youthful function in every cell*1-3,5–8,13,16 
  • Helps your body repair and renew itself*1-3  
  • Strengthens the systems that decline with age*1-3,8   
  • Backed by the world’s most advanced NAD+ science*

View Certificate of Analysis

A Smarter Way to Optimize NAD+*

NAD+ is more than a molecule — it’s the spark behind life itself, driving energy production, cellular repair, and resilience across every system of the body. But true NAD+ support goes beyond simply adding precursors. It requires a comprehensive strategy that:

  • Builds NAD+ through multiple molecular entry points*
  • Protects NAD+ from depletion and breakdown*
  • Transforms NAD+ into usable cellular energy*

That’s the science behind ProHealth’s NAD Triple Boost. Using a systems-based approach, it supports every step of the NAD+ lifecycle, helping replenish what aging reduces and delivering whole-body vitality you can truly feel.*1-3,6-8

Three Ways to Unlock Your NAD+ Potential

Build: Fuel Every Pathway*

The body builds NAD+ through several pathways. By providing a broad spectrum of precursors, this formula fuels the most important routes of NAD+ synthesis — helping maintain healthy, youthful levels of this vital coenzyme.*

  • NMN (Nicotinamide Mononucleotide): A clinically studied vitamin B3 derivative that drives the Salvage Pathway, recycling NAD+ for mitochondrial energy and sirtuin activation.*2,16,17
  • Vitamin B3 (Niacin & Niacinamide): Dual forms that feed both the Preiss–Handler and Salvage Pathways, the body’s main NAD+ production routes.*7,13
  • Tryptophan: An essential amino acid that supports serotonin synthesis while fueling the De Novo Pathway to generate NAD+ from scratch.*1,2,7
  • NMNH (Reduced NMN): A next-generation NAD+ precursor that bypasses rate-limiting steps, producing NAD+ faster and more efficiently.*8

Protect: Defend Your NAD+ Stores*

NAD+ can be rapidly depleted by enzymes such as CD38. NAD Triple Boost includes compounds that defend your stores, helping to minimize loss and extend NAD+ availability.*

  • Apigenin: A plant flavonoid that supports the preservation of NAD+ by targeting CD38, an enzyme that naturally consumes NAD+.*4

Transform: Turn NAD+ Into Energy*

Optimal NAD+ levels are only part of the equation. Your cells must efficiently use NAD+ to power critical enzymes and pathways related to aging and cellular health.* 

  • B Vitamins: (including methyl-folate and methyl-B12): Essential cofactors for ATP generation and methylation, important for energy metabolism and the recycling of NAD+ breakdown products.*9-12  
  • Stilbenoids (Resveratrol, Pterostilbene, & Piceatannol): Powerful polyphenol compounds that boost the activity of sirtuins — a family of enzymes that use NAD+ to fuel their activity. By activating sirtuins, these compounds help amplify the benefits of increased NAD+ levels.*14,15  

Your All-in-One NAD+ System

NAD Triple Boost isn’t just another supplement; it’s a comprehensive system designed to work with your body’s natural biology. By combining multiple proven precursors, plant compounds, and essential cofactors, it supports NAD+ at every stage of its lifecycle. The result is a formula that not only helps restore youthful NAD+ levels but also preserves them and channels them into real cellular energy. It’s a complete, science-driven solution for those who want to stay energized, resilient, and strong as they age.*1-3,5-8,13,16,17

The ProHealth Difference

  • Doctor-Formulated: Developed by our in-house science team in collaboration with leading wellness experts to address the root causes of aging.*
  • Triple Lab Tested: Rigorously tested three times by independent third-party labs to guarantee unmatched potency and purity.
  •  Full Transparency: In an industry full of misleading claims, we publish our third-party lab results—so you always know exactly what’s in every bottle. 
  • Manufactured in the USA: Since 1988, we’ve proudly produced our supplements in FDA-regulated, GMP-certified facilities, ensuring the highest quality and safety standards.
  • 100-Day Risk-Free Guarantee: We stand behind our products. If you’re not completely satisfied, contact our Santa Barbara, CA office for a full refund—no hassle, no questions asked.

A Word from our Chief Science Officer

“The NAD+ ecosystem isn’t a single switch. It is a dynamic, ever-evolving network of pathways, feedback loops, and cellular compartments that change with age. That’s why NAD Triple Boost was built to go beyond simple replenishment. By targeting multiple control points across the entire NAD+ system, we’re helping the body unlock its full regenerative potential. This is truly a smarter, more complete approach to NAD+ optimization.”

Pioneering Longevity Since 1988

No company offers a broader or more advanced range of NAD+ solutions than ProHealth. From foundational ingredients like NR and NMN to next-generation compounds such as NMNH and Apigenin, our collection spans every major pathway of NAD+ production. With diverse delivery forms, clinically studied ingredients, and formulations that address energy, brain function, metabolism, and longevity, ProHealth stands as the global leader in NAD+ innovation — trusted by researchers, practitioners, and health seekers worldwide.*

Ingredient Info 

  • Nicotinamide Mononucleotide (NMN): A clinically studied form of vitamin B3 that supports the NAD+ salvage pathway, helping replenish cellular NAD+ levels efficiently.* 
  • Tryptophan: An essential amino acid that feeds the De Novo NAD+ pathway.* 
  • Apigenin: A plant-based flavonoid that helps preserve NAD+ levels by targeting CD38, an enzyme known to degrade NAD+ in the body.* 
  • B Vitamins: Includes methylated and bioactive B vitamins that support mitochondrial energy production and provide methyl groups crucial for NAD+ metabolism.* 
  • Magnesium: A vital cofactor required for enzymatic reactions in NAD+ synthesis and ATP production, supporting optimal cellular energy function.*
  •  Resveratrol: A polyphenol that activates sirtuins—NAD+ dependent enzymes linked to longevity, cellular repair, and healthy aging.*
  • Pterostilbene: A powerful polyphenol related to resveratrol, known for its superior bioavailability and ability to activate sirtuins, support antioxidant defenses, and promote healthy NAD+ metabolism.* 
  • NMNH (Reduced NMN): A next-generation NAD+ precursor that bypasses key rate-limiting steps to support faster, more efficient NAD+ production through an alternative biochemical pathway.* 
  • Piceatannol: A naturally occurring stilbenoid that supports healthy inflammation signaling and may complement sirtuin activation and cellular resilience mechanisms.*
